subject: Baseball
Discrimination
Pregnancy and Childbirth
lead_paragraph: Leigh Castergine, a former ticket-sales executive for the Mets, filed suit in federal court, accusing the team and its chief operating officer of discriminating against her for being pregnant without being married.
snippet: Leigh Castergine, a former ticket-sales executive for the Mets, filed suit in federal court, accusing the team and its chief operating officer of discriminating against her for being pregnant without being married.
